name: setDividerImage(_:forLeftSegmentState:rightSegmentState:barMetrics:)
desc: Sets the divider image to use for a given combination of left and right segment states and bar metrics.
declaration:
func setDividerImage(_ dividerImage: UIImage?, 
 forLeftSegmentState leftState: UIControl.State, 
   rightSegmentState rightState: UIControl.State, 
          barMetrics: UIBarMetrics)
